fields.name: No gods, No demons (Passive):
fields.value: No roles that cannot win with town exist, regardless of the games role distribution. The game's host may break the game rules, and, if executed (must be a hammer), town wins, even if you are dead. If two or less players are alive, town loses.

fields.name: Town Spirits (Passive):
fields.value: Even if you are dead, roles aren't revealed upon death and dead players can still speak in day chat and hello neighbor.
